input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Taylor Stitch"
Reference Product Name: "The Democratic Chino"
Reference Product Description:
Originally issued to American soldiers during WWII, the first military chinos were celebrated for their comfort, versatility, and impressive ruggedness. They proved so popular, in fact, that soldiers held onto their well-worn pairs even after discharge, and as more and more civilians took notice, the style became a fixture of garages and workshops as well as college campuses and city streets all across the country. Featuring 100% Responsible materials and an updated silhouette, The Foundation Pant is both a reinvention of our earlier chinos and an elevated reimagining of the all-purpose originals, built to help you start your day on solid ground. Because it's been garment dyed and washed, it has the character of a well-loved vintage piece, and it'll continue to pick up a ton of nuance with wear. Cool herringbone accents at the waistband and the pockets serve as a nod to the style's military origins. SPECIFICATIONS Classic medium rise, tailored fit, straight through the thigh with a slight taper from knee to leg opening. Available in 32" inseam. 8-oz. 100% organic cotton. 5-oz. 100% organic cotton herringbone pocketing. Garment dyed and washed for a vintage feel. Front slash pockets allow easy entry into pockets. Low-profile welt coin pocket inset at waistband. Two back welt pockets. 4-hole vintage military style button at waistband. YKK zipper fly. Bound fly and outseam. Wash cold and tumble dry low. Made in China. Model is 6'1", wearing a 32.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Banana Republic | Gavin Straight Chinos - Men | Color: Brown | Size: 32 in.'
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's 30x32 Lived-in Chino Skinny-fit $85 Umbria Brown'
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's Straight Italian-Stretch Chino Pant Cream White Size 34W 34L'
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's Chinos'
  - Name='Banana Republic Pants Mens 32x32 Traveler Chino Athletic Tapered Fit'
  - Name='Men's Slim Lived-In Chino Ice Blue Regular Size 29W'
  - Name='$98 Banana Republic Fulton Skinny Fit Rapid Movement Chino, Charcoal,'
  - Name='Uniqlo Vintage Regular-Fit Chino Pants'
  - Name='Rhone Everyday Five Pocket Pant'
  - Name='Uniqlo Men's Skinny Fit 2-Way Stretch Chino Pants'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Performance Chino Pants'
  - Name='Taylor Stitch Men's Organic Cotton Slim Foundation Pants'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit Stretch Cotton Versatwill Trousers'
  - Name='Dockers Men's Big & Tall Straight Fit Smart 360 Knit Comfort Knit Chino Pants'
  - Name='Club Monaco Connor Chino'
  - Name='Club Monaco Connor 5-Pocket Pants'
  - Name='Club Monaco Men's Paper Twill Casual Pants'
  - Name='Rhone Men's Slim Fit Flat Front Commuter Pants'
  - Name='UNIQLO Relaxed Cotton Ankle Pants'
  - Name='Banana Republic Chinos Size 34 X 34 Pants'
  - Name='UNIQLO Men's Tall Faux Wool Ankle Pants'
  - Name='UNIQLO Men's Wide Cargo Pants'
  - Name='UNIQLO Women's Wide Chino Pants'
  - Name='UNIQLO Jersey Easy Cargo Pants'
  - Name='Ministry of Supply Men's Kinetic Tapered Pants'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic | Gavin Straight Chinos - Men | Color: Brown | Size: 32 in.
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Straight chinos from a well-known brand closely match the core product type, fit, and construction of the reference classic tailored chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's 30x32 Lived-in Chino Skinny-fit $85 Umbria Brown
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar chino pants but with a skinny fit, which is a notable difference from the tailored straight fit of the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's Straight Italian-Stretch Chino Pant Cream White Size 34W 34L
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Straight fit stretch chinos align very well with the style and intended use of the reference product, closely relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's Chinos
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Generic chinos likely similar in construction and use, though fit and detailed fabric characteristics not specified.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Pants Mens 32x32 Traveler Chino Athletic Tapered Fit
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Tapered athletic fit chinos are similar in essence but have a sportier silhouette compared to the tailored fit reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Slim Lived-In Chino Ice Blue Regular Size 29W
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit chino is related but differs in fit profile, less straight and tailored than the reference chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: $98 Banana Republic Fulton Skinny Fit Rapid Movement Chino, Charcoal,
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Skinny fit and possibly stretch fabric for mobility diverges from the classic tailored, straight silhouette of the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Uniqlo Vintage Regular-Fit Chino Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Vintage regular-fit chinos align well with the reference product's vintage style and tailored fit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rhone Everyday Five Pocket Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Five pocket pants may overlap in usage but likely more performance or activewear oriented, differing from classic chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Uniqlo Men's Skinny Fit 2-Way Stretch Chino Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Skinny fit and stretch fabric diverge from the more classic tailored straight fit of the reference chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's Performance Chino Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance chinos are similar in shape and purpose but emphasize technical fabrics over vintage or organic cotton construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Taylor Stitch Men's Organic Cotton Slim Foundation Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and very similar product with organic cotton and slim, likely updated tailored chinos matching the reference style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit Stretch Cotton Versatwill Trousers
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic-fit stretch trousers are similar but Lululemonâ€™s technical fabrics and trouser style diverge slightly from heritage chinos.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Straight fit chino pants designed for comfort align well with core features of the reference chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Club Monaco Connor Chino
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Club Monaco chinos are classic styled and likely similar in silhouette and function to the reference chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Club Monaco Connor 5-Pocket Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar chino style with an emphasis on 5-pocket detailing; close but less directly comparable due to naming ambiguity.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Club Monaco Men's Paper Twill Casual Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Casual pants made from paper twill resemble chinos but could be lighter weight fabric and less rugged than the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: UNIQLO Men's Wide Cargo Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Wide cargo pants have a different silhouette, function, and construction from slim tailored chinos.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Wide fit and women's cut differ significantly in fit silhouette though fabric type is similar.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Jersey knit cargo pants are functionally and stylistically distant from classic cotton chinos.
